p.k: Andrea Obaid and Cristián Campos visit two regions of our country, the Bío Bío Region and the Region of Araucanía to meet in two cities two significant natural phenomena for the population. Specifically, Andrea visits the area Dichato to know and understand the phenomenon of tsunami. To do this, you will plunge into the sea with a team of specialized divers to install sensors Tsunami research project by Rafael Aranguiz, Academic Department of Civil Engineering at the University of the Holy Conception. While on the other hand, Cristián travel to Villarrica to learn about the inactivity and activity Volcanoes Villarrica and Calbuco, through the work of volcanologists of the National Network of volcano monitoring that monitor possible volcanic eruptions in the area.
